page.title: 02HOOK NORTON LEISURE GROUPS
page.content: {The Adult Education Centre} meets at Hook Norton Primary School. The group aims to promote enjoyment of learning and friendship. {The Badminton Club} meets at the Memorial Hall. The group aims to win the Banbury League and play for enjoyment. {The Bellringers} meet at St. Peter's Church. The group ring the changes of eight bells to announce church services. {The Bowling Club} meets at the Sports and Social Club. The group aims to promote good sportsmanship and play inter-club competitions. {The Brownies} meet at Hook Norton Primary School. Members, girls aged 7-10, wear a brown uniform. Activities include games, singing and gaining badges. Special events include Brownie Revels.
